--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Autobots ---

Pacifix pulls up the the Autobot Council building. He opens a 
commlink to Jazz, "Jazz, we still have some spots to fill on the 
trip, if you find anybody who is willing to go, tell them to meet me 
sometime before I leave." he closes that commlink and opens 
another to JetV, "JetV, I need you to find Trailblazer, he hasn't 
reported in a while." He closes that commlink and spins fluidly into 
robot mode. He enters the Council building, and spots Artemis 
waiting for something. "Hello, may I ask who you are and why you 
are waiting here for?" he walks up and stands infront of Artemis. He 
carries several holoslides in his right arm. Pacifix smiles, "I'm 
Pacifix."


On 15 May 2001, at 6:27, airly2000@... wrote:

> Artemis:
> 
> The femme autobot was in Offices inside Autobot base, she was 
> waitting the decition of Autobot Council. She hoped that her skills
> were taking in count in the next mission. 
> 
> "I hope that they let me go" though the femme while she was walking
> around waitting that someone told her if she was chosen or not "I have
> the feeling that I can help..."
